content.rendered:
STEWART PROPERTIES

Stewart Properties is the real estate development and investment company of the Stewart Companies group. With offices in York, Pennsylvania, we are a Mid-Atlantic leader in real estate leasing and development with over:

  • 2 million square feet of office, flex, and retail space
  • 4,000 acres under residential, industrial, and commercial development
  • 8,000 additional acres for development

At Stewart Properties, we recognize that expanding or relocate your business takes energy and focus from your key personnel and operations. Our philosophy is simple: we put your needs first, and optimize your investment of time and resources. We are flexible and accommodating, and our goal is a successful, lasting partnership with our clients.

Stewart Properties’ real estate developments are long-term investments in the communities where they are located. So, naturally, new developments strengthen local economies. However, we take development a step further with forward-thinking approaches to site development and building design, creating outdoor and indoor environments that will provide superior facilities and workplaces for future generations.

ADDRESS

950 Smile Way
York, PA 17404

Capabilities

VISIT SITE CONTACT US
